name: Peter LD
body:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/PLyleD) | [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/peter.lyledugas) | [LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=46733484)

## Can I Bring My Bike on BART?
Pulls data from the [BART API](http://api.bart.gov/docs/overview/index.aspx) to find the next available, bike-friendly train. Fully responsive design. [[GitHub Repo](https://github.com/PeterLD/BART)]
![BART App Screenshot](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/56957781/portfolio/bart.png)

## Dekopon Tumblr Theme
A very orange, responsive tumblr theme. [[GitHub Repo](https://github.com/PeterLD/dekopon-tumblr)]
![Dekopon Tumblr Theme](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/56957781/portfolio/dekopon.jpg)

## Stopwatch App (Design Stage)
A stopwatch web application I'm working on.
![Stopwatch App](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/56957781/portfolio/stopwatch.png)

## The Dealmap
Samples of my development work at The Dealmap (acquired by Google in 2011), designed by our Visual Designer, [Harim](http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=19388546).
![Dealmap Android App](https://dl.dropbox.com/u/56957781/portfolio/dealmap1.png)
Promo page for The Dealmap Android App.
